title: Workshop on Integrating Safety Learning Development Practices in Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental safety management experience in occupational settings, secondary-level scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: A practical course where professionals implement organizational safety practices as learning tools. Includes simple data collection and sharing activities using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners explain three practical strategies to connect organizational safety practices with learning opportunities.
Learners develop improvement plans through reflective journaling based on safety case studies.
Learners propose collaborative approaches to foster organizational learning culture through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
